DOC.brief_summary: This study design investigate influence acute myocardial infarction checklist door-to-balloon time patient suffer acute STEMI Far Eastern Memorial Hospital
DOC.brief_title: The Influence Acute Myocardial Infarction Checklist Door-to-Balloon Time
